Package com.paiondata.aristotle.controller

Class GraphController

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.controller.GraphController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/graph") public class GraphController extends Object
Controller for handling graph-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getGraphByUuidAndFilterParams

      @PostMapping("/filter") public Result<GraphVO> getGraphByUuidAndFilterParams(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid FilterQueryGraphDTO dto)
      Retrieves a graph by its UUID and filter parameters.

      This method handles a POST request to retrieve a graph based on the provided UUID and filter parameters. It validates the input DTO and calls the graph service to fetch the graph data. The result is wrapped in a Result object and returned.

      Parameters:
      dto - the FilterQueryGraphDTO containing the UUID and filter parameters
      Returns:
      a Result object containing the graph data as a GraphVO

    • createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode

      @PostMapping public Result<GraphVO> createGraphAndBindGraphAndNode(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid GraphAndNodeCreateDTO graphNodeCreateDTO)
      Creates a graph and binds it with nodes.

      This method handles a POST request to create a graph and optionally bind it with nodes. It validates the input DTO and calls the node service to create the graph and nodes. If specified, it also binds the nodes with relationships. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message and the created graph data.

      Parameters:
      graphNodeCreateDTO - the GraphAndNodeCreateDTO containing the graph and node creation information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message and the created graph data as GraphVO

    • updateGraph

      @PutMapping public Result<String> updateGraph(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid GraphUpdateDTO graphUpdateDTO)
      Updates a graph.

      This method handles a PUT request to update a graph based on the provided update DTO. It validates the input DTO and calls the graph service to perform the update. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      graphUpdateDTO - the GraphUpdateDTO containing the updated graph information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message

    • deleteGraph

      @DeleteMapping public Result<String> deleteGraph(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid GraphDeleteDTO graphDeleteDTO)
      Deletes graphs by their UUIDs.

      This method handles a DELETE request to delete graphs based on the provided UUIDs. It validates the input DTO and calls the graph service to perform the deletion. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      graphDeleteDTO - the GraphDeleteDTO containing the UUIDs of the graphs to delete
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message
